She decided to head down to Sugarcube Corner for a Sweet Treat to bite on while she was considering what she could do. When she reached the place, Mrs. Cake smiled and greeted Applebloom. But Applebloom seemed very dispassionate.
"What's wrong, Applebloom? Did those mean girls call you names again?" Mrs. Cake asked.
"Nah, I'm just trying to get my Cutie Mark. It seems everyone's getting theirs, but not me!" Applebloom complained. "it just ain't fair..."
"Oh, don't feel bad. You know, I didn't get my Cutie Mark until I was in High School. Oh, I looked so ridiculous.. but I stayed positive! I knew I would get it someday, and when I joined the Cooking Club, I knew I was made to cook." Mrs. Cake smiled.
"I dunno..." Applebloom sighed, still not feeling any better.
"Oh, I can't bear to see you so sad... Here, have a Baker's dozen. On the house." Mrs. Cake smiled, handing Applebloom a big box of Cupcakes.

Applebloom sat down with her Cupcakes, and began to eat into one. This is when...

112111.content:
Applebloom loved the taste of the sweet cupcakes. The pink strawberry flavored frosting was really rich and creamy. After eating one, she ate several more of the cupcakes. She loved each and every one of them.

"Mrs. Cake, these cupcakes are some of the best you ever made." Applebloom said happily.

Applebloom continued to eat more of the cupcakes until she ate all 13 of them. Doing so gave Applebloom a bit of a pudgy and doughy belly.

"Those cupcakes were delish." Applebloom said rubbing her belly.
"Oh my dear. You ate all those cupcakes pretty quick." Mrs Cake said. "Like a champ eater."
"Well your cupcakes were good. I couldn't help but eat all of them." Applebloom said. "I would just love to eat them all the time."

At that moment, Applebloom's flank started to grow brightly. Applebloom then had a cutie mark. Her cutie mark was a cupcake with pink frosting and a bite on it. Applebloom got her cutie mark.

"My cutie mark. I GOT MY CUTIE MARK!!!" Applebloom shouted out happily.
"Congrats dear." Mrs. Cake said. She then took a closer look at Applebloom's cutie mark. "It's looks like an.... cupcake with a bite on it."
"So it's a cupcake eating cutie mark?" Applebloom asked. "Well I do like cupcake and eating them. In fact, can I have some more?"
"More?" Mrs. Cake said looking a bit shocked.

So Applebloom got her cutie mark. But what does it really mean?

Mrs. Cake happily made the food for the Filly, at first she was unsure about this, but after a while she realized how good it was for business. Applebloom always had the bits to pay for the meals, so as long as she was getting paid, Applebloom could eat as much as she wanted.

And Applebloom was happy.

Sweetie Belle smiles as she wakes up in her bed, her covers haphazardly tossed to the side. She's been working hard at something for months, and now she's got it.

The secret to getting fat fast.

She was ecstatic to move things along, eager to become as fat as she can, so she immediately set off to gain. This morning, she's officially reached obesity at five hundred pounds after several days of swapping all sugar and salt with this strange hunger-inducing and metabolism-slowing formula.
She sluggishly rolls out of her bed, having slept on top of the covers due to how little they actually cover, and lands on the ground with a heavy thud followed by intense jiggling. With a ticklish giggle, she regains her balance.
Her stomach churns and wobbles against the ground as she prepares her plodding waddle to the kitchen. Her three chine and heavy neck force her to keep her mouth hanging open. Her thighs and hips rub together at all times, her legs repeatedly pushing outwards to keep chafing with her belly from occurring. Her rear has started to develop folds, reaching below the knees as her hindlegs slowly lost their ability to bend. She didn't care in the slightest about her hindered mobility - in fact, she reveled in it, knowing soon she would need Rarity's help to do anything at all. The warmth gets warmer and warmer with every added inch, and she's fallen in love.

1233.content:
Little filly Sweetie Belle didn't fully know where she was she just was in somewhere filled with sweets and other random foods; she would know she had been stuffed one after another with dishes. Her sight, and touch senses were impaired with blind folds and bindings; but there was one thing that didn't change she could taste all the amazing tastes, and she could hear all the sounds. The clopping of hooves on an unknown floor type and the giggle... the infernal giggle it permeated her every cell but it was seemingly unrecognizable to anything she has heard and yet very familiar.

"Oh deary me I don't think you are full yet," Sweetie heard her captor whisper gently in her her ear as a hoof softly grazed the fur of her stretched out belly full of food. The pressed gently and slowly rubbed small circles into her tight little tummy. Sweetie didn't know how much more she cold hold in her before she either exploded or threw up, which ever came first she honestly didn't know. What she did know is that if she was able to control if she ate this much she probably still wouldn't stop the food was just entirely to good to stop; but she didn't have a choice in the matter this time and it was exciting her to no end in a small part of her brain. The belly rubs were helping her be ok with this for now and the whispers of feeding and being full enticed her brain to want more. It was at that point that little Sweetie Belle moaned softly at the touch of her captor. The hoof was removed quickly from Sweetie Belle and unannounced to the bound little filly a smile bigger then any smile before crossed the face of the pink party pony who held poor little Sweetie Belle in this room and being fed.

"Oh please let me go," Sweetie Belle requested rather weakly "I'm so full, I could surely pop," her eyes covered and her maw covered with various crumbs and food bits looked in the direction that the hoof came from, or at least so she thought it did.

"Is my marshmallow full?"the voice turned from sweet to malicious "you think you are full?" a platter clanged on to the ground as hooves were roughly placed on her head. Sweetie whimpered and winced "YOU ARE FULL WHEN I SAY YOU ARE FULL!" it was a scream that shook Sweetie's soul "Celestia help me, you are mine and i will do with you what i like, and i like my little filly's plump and you my little marshmallow is not plump enough so shut your BUCKING face and eat!" tears streamed down Sweetie's blind folded face. Despite all of that her mouth willingly opened for more, she felt the ball of a belly she was sporting was slowly churning up the food that was already there. Once the yelling finished the captor went to get more food, more cakes, more pies, more smores, more food and forced them down the poor filly's throat. Sweetie Belle fought as best as she could against her captor but it was for naught. Everything was a blur there were slaps to the face and harsh words to poor Sweetie Belle, as well as soothing, comforting words and soft belly rubs were given as what felt like at least an hour or two of feeding happened; and then as it began it just ended. Sweetie Belle was there bloated, full, bound, blinded, and heavy there was no more sound no more smell of food but she knew her captor was still there watching contemplating thinking. The one thing that brook the silence was a few burps and painful moans from the little stuffed marshmallow filly but that was it.

Lets see what Pinkie Pie has in store for our little Sweetie Belle

"Why, why me, why must it be me?" she whimpered trying to coax some humanity out of the pony captor. "I'm already so full, I, I, I could pop." 1323333332.content:
The strangest thing has been happening in Equestria. Many ponies have been bloating to the size of houses and desiring to become fatter. The weirdest thing about this is just how specific the epidemic is. The only ponies who were affected are mares and fillies, but which ones are affected seems absolutely random. The most logical reasoning they can come up with is that they were born with a certain gene that causes this, and said gene only started causing this recently because of some sort of change in the air. This in of itself it absolutely ridiculous, but it's the closest thing to making sense anyone can come up with.

Celestia's student Twilight was one of the first to be affected by it, so everyone assumed it was because of a haywire spell she cast at first, but again, the randomness of who was affected makes this seem unlikely. Even Celestia herself was hit by the strange virus, meaning Luna had to take over, leading some to assume she was the one to cause it, but many others believed she wouldn't actually do something as strange as this. Twilight and Rainbow Dash were the only two members of the Mane 6 to be affected by it, so it doesn't seem that any of the villains they've faced are the cause. Scootaloo was the only member of the CMC to affected by the virus, yet not the only filly in Ms. Cheerilee's class, as Diamond Tiara was also hit by it, further adding to the randomness.

Random is the only word that anyone could describe it as. Whoever got affected was random, the effect of the virus was random, and some gave trying to figure out the cause, labeling that as random. The citizens of Equestria all worked together to build a quarantine facility just to be safe. It was by far the largest building in Equestria, large enough to fit every pony who was hit by the strange virus. They were all given rooms the size of mansions, and were allowed to roam freely throughout the building with hallways as wide as towns, however the doors leading outside were small enough that only a normal sized pony could leave. For some reason, the virus still allowed the house sized ponies to move on their own, and the pegasi could even fly! The reason doors so small even existed on the building in the first place was so that scientists could come in and perform research in hope of eventually finding the cause.
1323333332.title: The epidemic

Although the researchers have made zero progress in finding the cause or a cure since it began, they did learn one thing. In order to keep all the blubber ball ponies stable, they have to gain at least ten thousand pounds a day. Otherwise, they could end up life threateningly sick. Many unicorns take shifts conjuring food out of thin air as their jobs because of the epidemic, however they thankfully don't have to worry about the unicorns in the quarantine as they can make the food themselves, as well as the two alicorns, Celestia and Twilight. Scootaloo and the other non-unicorns have 20 meals a day, all the size of large feasts, brought to them by ponies in protective suits. None of the building sized ponies cared about what was going on in the outside world, all they cared about was if they get their food.

Scootaloo, however, was a bit different. The ponies who worked at the quarantine zone had noticed that Scootaloo was more susceptible to illness than all the other ponies afflicted with the virus. After she was examined by the lead researchers, they learned that she was much more heavily affected by the virus than any other pony. They had to up her daily gain to twenty thousand pounds a day, meaning that the unicorns in charge of her gain had to work twice as hard, though they were given a raise accordingly.

1423221123.title: a year later

choices: Princess Celestia, feeling threatened by Dinky's popularity, investigates.
Dinky is somehow able to communicate how she feels.
14232211233.content:
Every day, the big pink mare cooked an absurd quantity of food, and every day Dinky ate it all and demanded more and more. As such, it wasn't very long before Dinky simply stayed with Pinkie, which meant she get fed still more. In just one month, Dinky became so fat that she gave up moving; at the time, this seemed like a smart decision. In two months, she lost all ability to. She couldn't so much as shift her legs, so fat were they. Four months, and she was barely even recognizable as a pony. Her legs were no longer visible beneath vast swells of flab, and her face was swaddled with so many chins that simply chewing exhausted her- yet she could not spend a second without eating, so hungry and fat was she. Recognizing this problem, Pinkie called in Scootaloo, who managed to rig up a simple tube-feeding mechanism to keep the enormous filly fed to bursting. Dinky was pleased with this change- at first. However, since she no longer had to spend all her energy on chewing, she had time to think; and with this time, she realized how much she missed the simpler things in life. Seeing her friends, going to school, even (shudder!) walking- all things that she hadn't done since moving in with Pinkie for good. She'd never thought of those things as good when she did them, but now, mostly alone in her flab, totally unable to care for herself, getting exhausted by existence- was this really what she wanted? Nevertheless, seeing as she really had no choice, she stuck it out and sucked plaintively on her tube, convinced it could only get better from there.

It had now been a year since the original feeding. Dinky Doo's ocean of gray flab had long outgrown the small confines of Sugarcube Corner, leaving the enormous filly outside and exposed to the elements. With her size came fame- and with fame came worship, worship from thousands of young mares who dreamed of being like Dinky. Every day, the mound of fat that was Dinky was mobbed by fans of all colors, shapes and sizes, squeezing her, touching her, some even going much farther, worming their way beneath her blanket of stomach and in between her enormous, yet invisible legs to get to where they needed to go. A cult had grown up around her, warbling out prayers and performing strange rituals somewhere by her left buttcheek, praying to their hilly goddess for salvation, for fat, for all sorts of things. In front, very close to her cavernous belly button, Pinkie Pie, now only mobile with the help of a cart and six stallions, sold souvenirs of Dinky and called for donations, telling rapt crowds of ponies of how much maintenance such a size needed and how, with their help, perhaps they could build a roof over her. An impossible task- Dinky was expanding far too fast, so even if a roof was built some part of her would always be sticking out. But, with that grand goal, they raked in plenty of bits for Dinky's impossible food budget and for the building of feeding machines. Dinky was presently up to six, all pumping pulverized grass into her mouth 24 hours a day, all failing miserably to solve the basic problem at hand-

Dinky was hungry. And Dinky was sad.

She hadn't seen anything that wasn't herself, the sky, or a worshipful pony for that entire year. Her head was sunk into a large cleft in her fat body, her back fat behind her and her stomach in front of her. Occasionally, a pony with enough bits poked his or her head over the top, peering down wide-eyed into that valley, at Dinky's impossibly small head amongst her impossible girth. Dinky used to try to blink at these ponies, to look excited at their presence; now, when she had the energy, she merely looked lazily at them and looked back forward. She couldn't talk to them, couldn't wave, couldn't even turn her head to look at them properly- only blink. Sometimes it rained, and her many folds were given a chill bath, the cleft where her head was filling somewhat with water. Sometimes it snowed, the flakes melting on her warm skin but chilling her in the process. Most of the time, she slept, and dreamed of a life where she was still little pudgy Dinky Doo, wobbling to school and gorging herself on real food, food that one had to chew.

Well, maybe a bit larger than pudgy.

Perhaps the size she had reached in the first week with Pinkie, when her belly first started to brush the ground. Oh, that tickly feeling...

She smiled as much as she could.
